scripts.say: You're much faster than I imagined...! And now, with two of you, it seems fleeing is no longer an option for me...
... I wasn't expecting you to be so calm. Have you accepted your fate?
I've already achieved my objective. The mere fact that you're here means that our transport ships can travel safely.
Even if you decide to pursue them right now, it's too late! We've won!
My only regret is that I couldn't say goodbye toâ€“
Same. I'm not running off anywhere on my own.
(O-oh my goodness, they're adorable! Ark, I think now I understand why you feel the way you do...!)
That means the transport ships are...! Scharnhorst, I must go! I can still catch up to them if I leave right at once!
Huh? You mean you're not fighting these chumps with me?
You will not get past us!
Why, you stubborn little flies... A cornered rat may bite the cat, but it stands no chance against a snake...
Save your analogies for later! Let's just take 'em out before it's too late!
I suppose we have no other choice...
